After recieving [[Obito]]'s [[Six Paths|Six Paths Power]], Kakashi forms a [[Lightning Cutter]] imbued with the power of Kamui. Anything pierced by this technique is instantly warped to [[Kamui's dimension]]. Combined with Kamui's intangibility, this technique allows for Kakashi to avoid an enemy's counter.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]] and [[Naruto x Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections]]'', Kakashi can perform this jutsu through his Susanoo.
